statements: GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE ON quantum_computing_research TO researcher_role;
GRANT SELECT ON quantum_computing_results TO researcher_role;
GRANT DELETE ON quantum_computing_results TO admin_role;

GRANT INSERT, UPDATE ON entanglement TO user2;
